original_title: Finding Your Own True Love with Dr. Diana Kirschner
overview: Drawing on her more than 25 years of experience in private practice, therapy supervision and workshop leadership, Dr. Diana Kirschner helps women in midlife address one of life's central issues: how to find and sustain love. In this PBS special, Kirschner identifies "the three deadly dating patterns," demonstrates how to break out of them and provides a four-part formula for creating lasting love.
title: Finding Your Own True Love with Dr. Diana Kirschner
